A Decision to Make

Tense family gathering, Dounia determined.  
Dounia: “I decided to ask you, Rodya.”  
Rodya: “What decision?”  
Pulcheria: “You must decide if you’ll come.”

---

Quiet evening, uncertainty hangs heavy.  
Pulcheria: “Pyotr Petrovitch won’t stay if you come.”  
Dounia: “I fully agree with her.”  
Razumihin: “Will you come?”  
Rodya: “Yes.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Dounia is determined to confront Pyotr Petrovitch and wants Rodya and Razumihin to support her during the meeting.
